page.title: 05Language and Dialect
page.content: The main language is English, which is spoken by most families. Welsh is spoken by some Farmers, and also by some families. Cantonese is spoken by families who have moved from China and Vietnam.Hindi is also spoken by Indian families. There are Italian people living in Blacon who work in the Pizza restaurant in Chester. Blacon also has its own slang words, used by teenagers . The language is mostly opposites of words which are commonly used in the English language. BEUT means ugly; CLEAN means dirty; KIND means nasty; BAD means good. There are slang words which have their own meaning; LIDS means not much, QUARRER means don't believe; WEDGENOLD means don't like your hair; ARRAS means you are not smart; MICROWAVE means it's hot out here; MEGA means really ugly.
